lead_paragraph: The European Central Bank also said it would cut the size of the program next year, while insisting it had no plans to end asset purchases altogether.

headline.print_headline: E.C.B. Extends Bond-Buying Program, but Says It Will Cut Size of Purchases
headline.main: E.C.B. Extends Bond-Buying Program to Protect Eurozone Economy

snippet: The European Central Bank also said it would cut the size of the program next year, while insisting it had no plans to end asset purchases altogether....
abstract: European Central Bank pres Mario Draghi insists decision to cut size of bonds and assets purchases is not signal ECB  is tapering market stimulus measures; announcement attempts to ease worries of analysts and investors that bank has begun limiting efforts to keep interest rates low.
